# Missing values

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
source("R/plot_missing_patterns.R")
```

```{r}
library(Lock5withR)

# shorten column names so as to only keep first 3 characters
myHollywood <- HollywoodMovies2011
names(myHollywood) <- substring(names(myHollywood), 0, 3)

# plot_missing_paramters function with counts on economics dataset
plot_missing_parameters(data = myHollywood, use_counts = TRUE)

# plot_missing_paramters function with percents on economics dataset
plot_missing_parameters(data = myHollywood, use_counts = FALSE)
```
